  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/598</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/598</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La cèl·lula</string>
            <string language="en">Cells</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cellules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pilhas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cellule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύτταρα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs multimèdia sobre la cèl·lula procariota i eucariota amb imatges al microscopi electrònic. Conté exercicis d'avaluació i enllaços externs per ampliar la informació.</string>
            <string language="en">Multimedia resource on prokaryotic and eukaryotic cells with images from an electronic microscope. It includes assessment exercises and external links for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències biològiques</string>
            <string language="en">biological sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias biológicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cèl·lula</string>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Multimediahilfsmittel auf den prokaryotic und 
eukaryotic Zellen mit Bildern von einem elektronischen Mikroskop. 
Es schließt Einschätzung Übungen und externe Links für 
weitere Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource de multimédia sur les cellules 
prokaryotic et eukaryotic avec des images d'un microscope 
électronique. Il inclut des exercices d'évaluation et des 
liens externes pour de plus amples informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso dos multimedia em pilhas prokaryotic e 
eukaryotic com imagens de um microscópio eletrônico. Inclui 
exercícios da avaliação e as ligações externas para uma 
informação mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa di multimedia sulle cellule prokaryotic ed 
eukaryotic con le immagini da un microscopio elettronico. 
Include le esercitazioni di valutazione ed i collegamenti 
esterni per ulteriori informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς πολυμέσων στα prokaryotic και 
ευκαριωτικά κύτταρα με τις εικόνες από ένα ηλεκτρονικό 
μικροσκόπιο. Περιλαμβάνει τις ασκήσεις αξιολόγησης και τις 
εξωτερικές συνδέσεις για περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">biologische Wissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les sciences biologiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cellule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciências biológicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pilha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienze biologiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cellula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιολογικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύτταρο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
